plugin.name: intelligence-scale
plugin.shortDescription: Structured workflows for predictable, high-quality AI-assisted development with Claude Code.
plugin.fullDescription: Intelligence Scale provides curated skills that enforce structured workflows for planning, execution, and verification in AI-assisted development. It ensures development is predictable, traceable, and maintains quality through explicit documentation, systematic progress, and built-in verification while preserving human oversight.

useCases.title: Project Planning
useCases.description: Create comprehensive development plans with exact tasks, file paths, and verification criteria before making any changes.

useCases.title: Structured Execution
useCases.description: Follow development plans systematically with built-in parallelism and verification gates to execute tasks efficiently while respecting dependencies.

useCases.title: Error Recovery
useCases.description: Handle failures gracefully with documented recovery procedures to prevent goal drift when things go wrong during development.

useCases.title: Quality Assurance
useCases.description: Audit and verify work through structured review processes to ensure every planned change was implemented correctly.

useCases.title: Idea Exploration
useCases.description: Brainstorm and refine ideas through collaborative dialogue before committing to implementation, ensuring well-thought-out solutions.
